title: The Feminine mistake

description: A realistic look at what happens to women who smoke, showing young smokers, a pregnant woman, cancer victims, habitual smokers with wrinkled faces, and tests showing how one cigarette affects vital body organs. Shows a successful program in progress at one high school which is aimed at discouraging smoking among teenagers. Hosted by Bonnie Franklin
